Package com.ch5

Class Poly

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ch5.Poly
  • public class Poly
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements immutable basic operations like creation, add, sub, mul etc on Polynomials e.g.: c_0x^0 + c_1x^1 + c_2x^2 + ... ... ...
    Author:
    akabir

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Poly()
      Initializes this to be the zero polynomial.
      Poly​(int n)  
      Poly​(int c, int n)
      Initializes this to be a polynomial cx^n if n>=0, else throws NegativeExponenetException.

      Get the degree of this.

            int n)
     throws com.customExceptions.NegativeExponenetException
        Initializes this to be a polynomial cx^n if n>=0, else throws NegativeExponenetException.
        Parameters:
        c - The coefficient of the polynomial.
        n - The degree of the polynomial.
        Throws:
        com.customExceptions.NegativeExponenetException - if n<0

    • Method Detail

      • degree

        public int degree()
        Get the degree of this.
        Returns:
        the degree of this, i.e. the largest exponent with non-zero coefficient. Returns 0 for zero-poly

        public Poly add​(Poly q)
        If q is null, throws NullPointerException; else add q to this.
        Parameters:
        q - A Poly to be added with this.
        Returns:
        the Poly this+q.
        Throws:

      • mul

        public Poly mul​(Poly q)
        If q is null, throws NullPointerException; else multiply q with this.
        Parameters:
        q - A Poly to be multiplied with this.
        Returns:
        a Poly this*q.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if q is null.
